CSS
format:
<style>

.my_border {
    border: 1px solid red;
}

.count_display {
    display: flex;
    height: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    font-family: var(--f-ab-family);
    font-size:5em;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: var(--a-color);
    _text-shadow: 2px 2px 1px #fff;
    _letter-spacing: -.01em;
}

.big_numeric {
    font-weight: 700;
    background-color: #333;
    font-family: inherit;
}

.big_numeric button {
    _background-color: #ccc;
    _box-shadow: 2px 2px 1px #fff inset;
    _font-size:2em;
    padding: 0px 30px;
}


.value {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-family: var(--f-a-family);
    font-weight: 100;
}

.donut_font tspan {
    font-family: var(--f-a-family) !important;
    font-size: 14px !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-cardpanel > p {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-content: stretch;
    align-items: center;
    max-height: 40px;
    min-height: 40px;
    margin: 0px;
    min-width: calc(100% - 40px) !important;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: larger;
    line-height: 0px;
    background-color: #f1f1f1;
}

.nr-dashboard-cardcarat {
    display: flex !important;
    justify-content: center !important;
    align-items: center !important;
    
    margin-right: -20px !important;
    
    padding:6px;
    
    _background-color: #555;
    _display: inline-block;
    min-width:50px;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    cursor: pointer;
}

</style>

name: .my_slider
format:
<style>

/* MY SLIDER */
.my_slider {
    left: 0px !important;
    top: 120px;
    width: 100% !important;
    height: 48px;
}

.my_slider .md-thumb-text {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    color: #f1f1f1 !important;
    _display:none;
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    filter: invert(0) !important;
    min-width: 40px;
    min-height: 40px;
    padding:5px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    font-family: var(--f-a-family);
    font-size: 1.2em !important;
    color: #333 !important;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    border: 0px solid #999 !important;
}

.my_slider .md-sign {
    color: red;
    _display:none;
    background-color: blue;
    
}

.my_slider .md-sign::after {
    border: 0px solid transparent;
}

.my_slider .md-focus-ring {
    background-color: #1F77B4 !important;
    transform: scale(0.6) !important;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.my_slider .md-track , .my_slider .md-track-fill {
    background-color: #ccc !important;
}

.my_slider .md-thumb::after {
    background-color: #1F77B4 !important;
    border-width: 0px !important;
}

</style>

name: .my_button
format:
<style>
/* MY BUTTON */
.my_button .md-button {
    color: var(--a-color) !important;
    border-radius: 0px !important;
}

.my_button .md-button.md-raised:not([disabled]), 
.my_button .md-button.md-raised:hover {
    box-shadow: none !important;
}
</style>

name: .my_button_big
format:
<style>
/* MY BUTTON */
.my_button_big .md-button {
    color: var(--a-color) !important;
    border-radius: 50% !important;
    background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;
    max-width: 84px;
    max-height: 84px;
    margin-left:10px;
    
}

.my_button_big .md-button.md-raised:not([disabled]), 
.my_button_big .md-button.md-raised:hover {
    _box-shadow: none !important;
    _left: 250px !important;
    _top: 27px !important;
}
</style>

name: .my_cronjobs
format:
<style>
.my_cronjobs {
    text-align: left;
} 

.layout-align-center-center {
    justify-content: flex-start !important;
    align-content: flex-start !important;
    align-items: center;
    max-width: 100%;
}

.layout-align-center-center > p {
    width: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
}
</style>

name: .fill_level
format:
<style>

.fill_level path {
    fill: #ccc !important;
}

.fill_level circle {
    fill: #4f73b6 !important;
}

.fill_level text {
    font-weight: 700 !important;
    _font-size: 20px !important;
}

</style>
